title: Preparing for a future shaped by AI
description: BENTONVILLE, Ark  — As artificial intelligence and demographic changes reshape the U.S. job market, the nation’s largest private employer is trying to identify the skills its workers and the broader labor force might need for the future. title: Apple Inc. Revamps AI Strategy, Emphasizing Chatbots and Overhauling Siri
description: In a significant shift in its artificial intelligence (AI) strategy, Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) is reportedly prioritizing chatbot-like experiences and overhauling its Siri voice assistant.

title: An Engels’ pause in an AI-shaped world
description: As Artificial Intelligence reshapes the global economy, the world faces the question whether it is we entering a modern Engels’ pause
content:
The other day, Artificial Intelligence (AI) pioneer and Nobel Laureate Geoffrey Hinton, in the Financial Times, said that AI will make a few people rich and the rest of us poorer. In doing so, he hinted at an Engels’ pause in our modern AI economy.

title: Smart tech brings sea change in shipbuilding as revival gathers pace
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is another game-changer, used to optimise ship design, predict maintenance needs, and streamline production schedules
content:

title: Who is Tilly Norwood? AI ‘actress’ may soon sign with agency as studios increasingly turn to artificial intelligence
description: AI actress Tilly Norwood is attracting interest from talent agents, according to Eline Van der Velden at the Zurich Summit. Created by her new AI talent studio Xicoia, Norwood could soon be one of the first digital performers with agency representation as studios quietly adopt AI.
content:
At the Zurich Summit this weekend, actor and technologist Eline Van der Velden revealed that her new AI talent studio, Xicoia, is already in discussions with agents about signing its first creation — a hyperreal AI actress named Tilly Norwood.

title: Defense tech firm Kela buys AI startup to bolster platform for modern battlefield
description: In its first acquisition, Kela buys Pelanor to expand its OS, which helps militaries integrate commercial technology like artificial intelligence into defense systems
content:
Israeli defense tech company Kela Technologies — founded in the wake of the October 7, 2023, onslaught — has acquired AI startup Pelanor, its first acquisition, as it builds a military operating system tailored for the modern battlefield.
